title: Pyrolysis behaviour and synergistic effect in co-pyrolysis of wheat straw and polyethylene terephthalate: A study on product distribution and oil characterization
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Anis Kumar M, Swarnalatha A.P, Shwetha J, Sowmya Dhanalakshmi C, Saravanan P, Ashraf Atef Hatamleh, Munirah Abdullah Al-Dosary, Ravishankar Ram Mani, Woo Jin Chung, Soon Woong Chang, Balasubramani Ravindran
